title: Comparison Tables
text:
This section compares five key KBA score metrics. These comparisons can help determine which metric is most appropriate for downstream analyses. For now, the species score sums within each KBA has been used, but this can be easily changed.






Rank


KBA Name


Species Score Sum (per 1 km²)






1


Uplands Park - Cattle Point

2


Kohweechela - Mary Tod Island


11595.374




3


Harling Point


9763.784




4


Christmas Hill


9747.873




5


Fort Rodd Hill


9391.102
